name: automatic sales order when quotation created
script:
sales_order = frappe.new_doc("Sales Order")
sales_order.customer = doc.customer

# Copy items
for item in doc.items:
    sales_order.append("items", {
        "item_code": item.item_code,
        "qty": item.qty,
        "rate": item.rate
    })

# Required fields
sales_order.transaction_date = doc.transaction_date
sales_order.delivery_date = doc.valid_till or doc.transaction_date

# Insert and submit
sales_order.insert()
sales_order.submit()

frappe.msgprint(f"Sales Order {sales_order.name} created automatically.")
